Header: South Africa's president visits Sri Lanka
Content: President of South Africa, Jacob Zuma arrived in the island last midnight. He arrived in Sri Lanka while on his way to the BRICS Summit held in China. Hiru Airport correspondent stated that the South African President stayed at the airport from last midnight to 1.40am today, after having dinner at the premises. 75 year-old African National Congress member, Zuma was in office as the president in South Africa since 8 years. Zuma was able to win a No-Confidence motion presented to the parliament against him recently.
